title: The Divisions
description: The world is separated into two divisions. Division One is made up of the living and Division Two was the… not so living. The Sentients and the Nosferatu, the Vampires. The Sentients and Nosferatu have been at war since the beginning. It is said that once they coexisted without war, they had both managed to find a common ground, but it was short lived. Very short lived. The living killed the Nosferatu, and in turn, the Nosferatu built up their ranks with the living. This was now our version of the circle of life. Kill the killers and die for the dead.Twenty-one year old Temperance Millicent struggles to survive in a world that wants her dead. Her birth parents were slaughtered by Division Two and her adoptive parents would suffer for not handing her over to the government. Temperance finds herself in the middle of a war, on the run from the government, vampires, and a new Division, the Lycan’s.Every girl dreams of waking up one day, a Princess. Until that day kicks you in the face, wearing steel toed boots, only to learn that you had to die to wear that crown. Here is the story of how Temperance Millicent dies.
author: L.A. Kennedy
